message:
"Rwandan Requiem"

Fears sprout, bountiful in Tory souls,
In the dance of politics, unease unrolls.
Amidst clamor, Sunak's tune boldly soars,
Rwanda's future - an enigma at the door.
In this translucent twilight, trust is the musical score.
prompt: Tories warn Rishi Sunak that his Rwanda plan ‘will never be law’ Senior Tories from across the party are warning that Rishi Sunak’s emergency Rwanda plan will never become law in its current form, ahead of the most critical vote of his premiership. Liberal Tories confirmed last night that, despite their desire to back the PM against the right, “serious concerns” remain about the plan and more reassurances will be required.
